title: Blue Ocean Equities raising for beauty company
text:
Blue Ocean Equities is out this morning raising capital for lifestyle brand owner and clinical spa business Wellness and Beauty Solutions.

Wellness and Beauty solutions own nine clinical spas on the east coast. Supplied

Wellness is looking to raise $5 million via a two tranche share placement at 1¢ a share, a 41.2 per cent discount to its last close of 1.7¢. Bids are due by 4pm Tuesday.

According to a term sheet sent to fund managers on Monday, Wellness will use the equity for product manufacturing and inventory, geographic expansion and capability investment.

The beauty company has a market capitalisation of $6 million and generated $16 million pro forma revenue in the 2019 financial year.

It has a three year goal to reach a $100 million run rate and $5 million in net profit after tax, the term sheet said.

Wellness owns beauty and lifestyle brands including the Jennifer Hawkins founded self-tanning range Jbronze. It also owns nine clinical spas on the east coast.
description: Blue Ocean Equities is raising capital for lifestyle brand owner and clinical spa business Wellness and Beauty Solutions.
